mdRecord.dcterms:title: Fiduciary Accounts: Guardianship of Pleasant Thompson Thompson, Pleasant reached the age of 21 on 09.30.1878
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Guardianship of Pleasant Thompson Thompson, Pleasant reached the age of 21 on 09.30.1878 J. H. Altizer, Guardian Recorded in Ledger Book 3, page 28, in Floyd County Courthouse

mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: The Circuit Court of Floyd County
